properties.abstract: A cabin on a marvellous site, high alpine landscapes and an exciting trail with a few delicate passages characterise this tour to Chrinnenhorn. The summit is a relatively easily reachable vantage point in front of the mighty Wetterhorn with a splendid view to the Schreckhorn chain and Grindelwald deep below. However, some experience in alpine terrain is required. As an alternative or an additional tour for a second day we recommend  a round trip to Oberer Grindelwaldgletscher, as it is worthwile spending the night in Glecksteinhütte after having mastered the long ascent.
properties.subtitle: A dream for those who are unafraid of heights
properties.title: Via Glecksteinhütte

sac_photos.title: Just a few steps away from Chrinnenhorn. Behind Eiger and Mönch (to the very left) are visible.
Across a plateau with rubble towards Chrinnenhorn (at the back)
